meanings.definition: A place where pottery is made.
meanings.sent1: The small town had several potteries where skilled artisans crafted beautiful clay pots.
meanings.sent2: Visiting the local potteries is a fun way to learn about traditional craftsmanship.
meanings.sent3: The potteries in the village were so busy that the clay started to take over the streets!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a bustling potteries of ideas, shaping and molding thoughts into tangible creations.
meanings.sent5: The potteries hummed with activity as the potters worked their magic on the spinning wheels.

meanings.definition: The art or craft of making pottery.
meanings.sent1: Learning the potteries requires patience and a steady hand to mold the clay into beautiful shapes.
meanings.sent2: She studied the techniques of the potteries to create her own unique ceramic pieces.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at the potteries class resulted in a lopsided, misshapen vase that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the potteries of life, we shape our experiences into vessels of memories to cherish.
meanings.sent5: The potteries of creativity in her mind spun endlessly, forming new ideas with each turn of the wheel.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a vast collection of ancient potteries from different civilizations.
meanings.sent2: She admired the colorful potteries on the shelves, each telling a unique story.
meanings.sent3: The potteries on the table clinked together as she set them down, creating a musical sound.
meanings.sent4: His room was filled with various potteries, each holding sentimental value and memories.
meanings.sent5: The potteries in the shop window gleamed under the sunlight, enticing passersby to take a closer look.
